meanings.definition: A tricyclic antidepressant drug used to treat depression.
meanings.sent1: Desipramine can help improve mood in individuals with depression.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed desipramine to treat my depression.
meanings.sent3: After taking desipramine, I felt like a weight had been lifted off my shoulders.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a dose of desipramine, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The effects of desipramine on my mental health were truly remarkable.

meanings.definition: The generic name for a medication that belongs to the class of drugs known as tricyclic antidepressants.
meanings.sent1: Desipramine is one of the tricyclic antidepressants used to treat various conditions.
meanings.sent2: When discussing antidepressants, desipramine is often mentioned as a common option.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally mistook sugar for desipramine in the kitchen, causing a funny mix-up.
meanings.sent4: The influence of desipramine on the brain is like a key unlocking better mental health.
meanings.sent5: The pharmacist explained the benefits of desipramine in simple terms that I could understand.
